title: Looking for that special girl gamer to be my league buddy <3
body: Seriously needing someone to play with. I need me a ADC <3 or anyone to play with and have a chat to. Looking for that special girl gamer <3                  My summoner name is ST Poleris so feel free to add me <3

replies.body: Im not fetishing over anyone, im just looking for that special someone.
I need people to stop fetishizing me simply for playing video games, but I guess that isn't gonna happen any time soon either.
